TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SharePointProjectItemIconAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定针对自定义项目项类型要在解决方案资源管理器中显示的图标。

span.span: Specifies the icon to display in **Solution Explorer** for a custom project item type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此特性应用于接口的实现, 以指定要为项目项类型显示的图标。Apply this attribute to an implementation of the interface to specify the icon to display for the project item type. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：定义 SharePoint 项目项类型](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-define-a-sharepoint-project-item-type)。For more information, see [How to: Define a SharePoint Project Item Type](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-define-a-sharepoint-project-item-type). 为图标使用嵌入的24位 .bmp 或 .ico 资源, 将洋红色 (255, 0255) 作为透明色。Use an embedded 24-bit .bmp or .ico resource for the icon, with magenta (255,0,255) as the transparent color. 建议的图标大小为16像素宽 x 16 像素高。The recommended size for icons is 16 pixels wide by 16 pixels high.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string iconResourceName) cil managed

param.name: iconResourceName
param.span: 要用作自定义项目项类型图标的嵌入式 .bmp 或 .ico 资源的命名空间限定的名称。

span.span: The namespace qualified name of an embedded .bmp or .ico resource to use as the icon for a custom project item type.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用带有洋红色 (255, 0255) 的图标的24位图像作为透明色。Use 24-bit images for the icon, with magenta (255,0,255) as the transparent color. 建议的图标大小为16像素宽 x 16 像素高。The recommended size for icons is 16 pixels wide by 16 pixels high.

summary.span: 获取或设置要用作自定义项目项类型图标的嵌入式 .bmp 或 .ico 资源的命名空间限定的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace qualified name of an embedded .bmp or .ico resource to use as the icon for a custom project item type.

value.span: 要用作自定义项目项类型图标的嵌入式 .bmp 或 .ico 资源的命名空间限定的名称。

span.span: The namespace qualified name of an embedded .bmp or .ico resource to use as the icon for a custom project item type.
